amount.description: The amount of damage it should do to the item stack.
amount.markdownDescription: The amount of damage it should do to the item stack.

ignore_unbreaking.description: Determines if this action should ignore the Unbreaking enchantment.
ignore_unbreaking.markdownDescription: Determines if this action should ignore the Unbreaking enchantment.

type.description:
[Item Action Type](../item_action_types.md)

Damages the item stack with a specified amount.

Type ID: `apugli:damage`

!!! note

    If you do not need to display the break animation upon having this item break, please use Apoli's [Damage (Item Action Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_action_types/damage) instead.
type.markdownDescription:
[Item Action Type](../item_action_types.md)

Damages the item stack with a specified amount.

Type ID: `apugli:damage`

!!! note

    If you do not need to display the break animation upon having this item break, please use Apoli's [Damage (Item Action Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_action_types/damage) instead.
